resources.name: Magic Sword
resources.description: A sword imbued with magical power that glows with an ethereal light.

resources.name: Dragon Scale Armor
resources.description: Armor crafted from the scales of an ancient dragon, providing exceptional protection.

resources.name: Super Health Potion
resources.description: A powerful healing potion that can restore significant health instantly.

resources.name: Mana Elixir
resources.description: A mystical elixir that restores magical energy.

resources.name: Ancient Key
resources.description: An ornate key that seems to pulse with ancient magic. It might unlock something important.

resources.name: Mysterious Artifact
resources.description: A strange artifact of unknown origin. Its purpose remains a mystery.

resources.name: Health Potion
resources.description: A basic healing potion that restores health.

resources.name: Iron Ore
resources.description: Raw iron ore that can be smelted into iron bars.

resources.name: Gold Ore
resources.description: Precious gold ore that can be smelted into gold bars.

resources.name: Copper Ore
resources.description: Common copper ore that can be smelted into copper bars.

resources.name: Mithril Ore
resources.description: A rare and precious metal ore that shimmers with silver light.

resources.name: Limestone
resources.description: Rough limestone that can be cut into building stone.

resources.name: Coal
resources.description: Combustible coal used as fuel for smelting.

resources.name: Rough Emerald
resources.description: An uncut emerald that can be refined into a precious gem.

resources.name: Rough Ruby
resources.description: An uncut ruby that can be refined into a precious gem.

resources.name: Rough Sapphire
resources.description: An uncut sapphire that can be refined into a precious gem.

resources.name: Rough Diamond
resources.description: An uncut diamond that can be refined into a precious gem.

resources.name: Iron Bar
resources.description: Smelted iron bar for crafting weapons and armor.

resources.name: Gold Bar
resources.description: Smelted gold bar for crafting jewelry and decorations.

resources.name: Copper Bar
resources.description: Smelted copper bar for crafting basic items.

resources.name: Mithril Bar
resources.description: Smelted mithril bar for crafting legendary equipment.

resources.name: Cut Stone
resources.description: Precisely cut stone blocks for construction.

resources.name: Emerald
resources.description: A brilliant green gemstone, cut and polished.

resources.name: Ruby
resources.description: A fiery red gemstone, cut and polished.

resources.name: Sapphire
resources.description: A deep blue gemstone, cut and polished.

resources.name: Diamond
resources.description: A brilliant diamond, the most precious of gems.

resources.name: Enchanted Wood
resources.description: Wood from a tree blessed by nature spirits, perfect for magical crafting.

resources.name: Crystal Essence
resources.description: Pure magical essence extracted from elemental crystals.

resources.name: Void Silk
resources.description: Silk spun by void spiders, incredibly strong and magically conductive.

resources.name: Wood
resources.description: Basic wood logs useful for crafting and construction.

resources.name: Gold Coins
resources.description: Standard gold coins used as currency throughout the realm.

resources.name: Platinum Coins
resources.description: Rare platinum coins worth significantly more than gold.

resources.name: Dragon Gems
resources.description: Precious gems that dragons hoard, extremely valuable and rare.

resources.name: Guild Tokens
resources.description: Special tokens earned through guild activities and achievements.

resources.name: Arcane Energy
resources.description: Pure magical energy used to power spells and enchantments.

resources.name: Soul Essence
resources.description: The essence of one's soul, used for the most powerful magical rituals.

resources.name: Enchanted Stone
resources.description: Magically reinforced stone used in the construction of mystical buildings.

resources.name: Spectral Arrows
resources.description: Arrows imbued with spectral energy that can pierce through magical defenses.
